name: Roots of Another Kind
description:
You are a teeth witch turned florist, and just opened your new shop in a new town. You are the only shop that sells the elusive people plant, plants made from human teeth.   Talk to customers,  sell plants, steal teeth,  try not to destroy a town and try to make enough money to by rent by the end of the week.

This game was made during the 2020 Narrascope Game Jam.
